Metadata: Preliminary findings and recommendations to the port of Newport commission concerning: moorage rates and the shortage of moorage space at the port of Newport

The findings and recommendations in this report summariz​es the most pertinent findings and recommendations​ of our on-going investigation of moorage rates and port-related economic problems on the Oregon coast. Problems exist such as shortage of moorage space, deserving subsidy, rate schedules, schedules based on long-run costs, moorage rates based on moorage area occupied, proposed annual moorage rates, and more.
